pages.contact: Contact Beleza Hotel - Reach Out for Reservations & Inquiries Home Casino Rooms Service Contact Home Casino Rooms Service Contact Contact Beleza Hotel We are here to assist you with any inquiries or concerns you may have. Reach out to us for reservations, questions about our services, or any other information you need. Our dedicated team is ready to help you make the most of your stay at Beleza Hotel. Explore Our Rooms Frequently Asked Questions What are the check-in and check-out times? Check-in is from 3:00 PM, and check-out is until 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges. How can I make a reservation? Reservations can be made directly on our website, through our mobile app, or by contacting our reservation team at beleza@gmail.com. What is the cancellation policy? Cancellations made within 24 hours of the reservation will incur a cancellation fee. No-shows will be charged the full booking amount. Do you offer airport transportation? Yes, we offer airport transportation services. Please contact us in advance to arrange your pick-up and drop-off. Is Wi-Fi available at the hotel? Yes, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel for all our guests. Do you have accessible rooms? Yes, we offer accessible rooms equipped with features to ensure a comfortable stay for guests with disabilities. Please let us know your requirements when making a reservation. Are pets allowed at the hotel? We have a no-pet policy to ensure the comfort and safety of all our guests. What amenities are available in the rooms? Our rooms are equipped with modern amenities including flat-screen TVs, air conditioning, minibars, and luxurious bedding. Additional amenities are available upon request. Do you offer any special packages or discounts? Yes, we offer various packages and discounts throughout the year. Please check our website or contact us for the latest offers. How can I contact the hotel for further inquiries? You can contact us via email at beleza@gmail.com or call our front desk at [phone number]. We are here to assist you 24/7. Book an Appointment I accept privacy policy Send Manchester, UK +44-077-4619-3239 beleza@gmail.com Home Casino Rooms Contact Disclaimer Terms Conditions Privacy Policy
